name: starlight-flexoki
title: Starlight Flexoki
desc: A warm and friendly theme for your Starlight docs based on the Flexoki colour palette.
article:
This is a theme for the Starlight docs framework based on the Flexoki colour palette.

Features

  • Flexoki colour theme: Dark and light colour schemes based on Flexokiâs warm and inky shades, including matching syntax highlighting.
  • Readable design: A simple design with minimal clutter, featuring large body text and clear details.
  • Configurable accent color: Pick from Flexokiâs eight accent colour options.
